text:
Hello everyone,
Today you have available a step-by-step guide for both designing and implementing JWT-based Authentication in an Angular Application.Â 
And because in order to implement most security features we need some server code, we will show that too (in Node / Typescript):
Click Here For Immediate PDF Download (https://s3-us-west-1.amazonaws.com/angular-university/blog-pdf-downloads/Angular_Authentication_Complete_Guide.pdf)
In thisÂ guide,Â we will follow the complete journey of a JWT starting with creation on the Authentication server and back to the client, and then back to the Application server and talk about all the design decisions involved.
I hope you will enjoy today's post and the new lessons,Â I want to thank you for reading and wish you an awesome day!
Kind Regards,
Vasco
Angular University
angular-university.io (https://angular-university.io)

textAsHtml:
Hello everyone,
Today you have available a step-by-step guide for both designing and implementing JWT-based Authentication in an Angular Application. 
And because in order to implement most security features we need some server code, we will show that too (in Node / Typescript):
Click Here For Immediate PDF Download (https://s3-us-west-1.amazonaws.com/angular-university/blog-pdf-downloads/Angular_Authentication_Complete_Guide.pdf)
In this guide, we will follow the complete journey of a JWT starting with creation on the Authentication server and back to the client, and then back to the Application server and talk about all the design decisions involved.
I hope you will enjoy today's post and the new lessons, I want to thank you for reading and wish you an awesome day!
Kind Regards,
Vasco
Angular University
angular-university.io (https://angular-university.io)
